posts.post_title: WTT/WTS: HM Taylor Ty Cobb rookie
posts.post_content:
I picked up another postcard so looking to trade this one for another cobb or wagner, would consider selling but really prefer a card to be included. please pm or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if interested!
